page.title: 10A DAY AT DIPTFORD SCHOOL
page.content: This is a typical day at school. I am collected in the morning by the School {Mini-Bus}at 8.5O. At 9 I go into the playground after I am called in to do my Fletcher after which I have a School Assembly then a 15 minute break. Then I complete my Fletcher and my project work. Swimming follows until the end of the morning, then I wait for my sitting to go for{lunch.}I have packed lunch in the Parish Hall. After this I have a five minute break followed by Art then another break. Later I am called in to see Father Peter the Rector. I then go home. The {School building}was built in 1863. There are now 77 children in the School and every year the 4th year transfer to King Edward VI College in Totnes.
